description: Investigate and fix TypeScript compiler hanging issue

workstreams.findings: Identified incremental=true with noEmit=true conflict causing deadlock

workstreams.result: Success - completes in 18.978 seconds without hanging

decisions.decision: Identified configuration conflict: incremental=true with noEmit=true causes TypeScript to hang
decisions.rationale: TypeScript cannot write .tsbuildinfo file when noEmit is true, creating a process hang after type-checking completes

decisions.decision: Remove incremental flag instead of removing noEmit
decisions.rationale: Next.js requires noEmit=true for type-checking only. Incremental builds are unnecessary as Next.js handles compilation and caching

decisions.decision: Delete existing .tsbuildinfo file to prevent cache conflicts
decisions.rationale: Stale cache from previous configuration could cause issues with updated config

decisions.decision: Validated fix with multiple test runs
decisions.result: TypeScript now completes in ~19 seconds without hanging. Issue resolved.

outcome: Successfully resolved TypeScript hanging issue by removing incremental/noEmit configuration conflict
